attributes.action: Stop the food price hike, freeze the food, medicine, hygiene product prices.
attributes.additional_details:
I find out the shortage caused by the supermarkets for the attempting to hike the food prices.
I've started an investigation into how the panic effected the supermarkets and the off-license shops. I've found out that the off license shop shelves are always full  while the supermarkets doesn't fill their shelves for days and weeks.
I started the investigation 2 weeks ago (02/03/2020). 
The supermarkets started to hike the prices on 22/03/2020 and we need to stop them and pretend them to take advantage on the crisis.
attributes.background: Stop the food price hike, freeze the food, medicine, hygiene product prices from 21/03/2020 when the supermarkets started to hike the prices.

rejection.details:
The price of consumer goods is a matter for individual producers and retailers, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to restrict people stockpiling and reselling items at inflated prices, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
